name: Star★Vaders
description:
Mecha roguelike-deckbuilding tactical shoot-em-up! Upgrade your deck with impactful cards, master the unique grid-based tactics, and discover game-changing combos in Star★Vaders.

A fusion of Slay the Spire, Into the Breach, and Space Invaders (?!), Star★Vaders is a thrilling turn-based strategy game in which you pilot a mecha armor to fight swarms of alien invaders in a rogue-lite campaign of grid-based tactical card battles.

Wishlist now to help support the development of the game!

★ We're still actively working on this game! So if you have any feedback or encounter any bugs, please join our Discord and let us know! We're listening to you and want to make the best game possible!

★ Stay updated by signing up to our Newsletter!

★ For journalists, content creators, or potential publishers, check out our Press Kit! (PS: I'd love to chat with you! Send us a message!)
